The Southwest Clean Air Agency and the Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Quality Advisory due to elevated levels of ozone pollution, or smog. entry.title: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 15 at 2:02PM PDT until August 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...High risk for heat-related illnesses for much of the population, pets, and livestock, especially with extended outdoor exposure. High temperatures of 96 to 108 expected. Limited relief at night with low temperatures in the mid 60s to low 70s.

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued August 15 at 11:55AM PDT until August 16 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT WEDNESDAY FOR DRY AND UNSTABLE FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 658 AND 659... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 658 West Slopes of the North Cascades Generally above 1500 Feet and Fire Weather Zone 659 West Slopes of the Central Cascades Generally above 1500 Feet. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent.
